messages.content: rembg-comfyui-node is a Background Removal Node for ComfyUI, which uses the Rembg library to remove the background from images.
How do I clone the rembg-comfyui-node repository to my `custom_nodes` folder in ComfyUI?
You can clone the repository by using the command `git clone https://github.com/Jcd1230/rembg-comfyui-node.git`.
How do I install the `rembg[gpu]` or `rembg` library to my ComfyUI virtual environment?
You can install the desired package by using the command `pip install rembg[gpu]` or `pip install rembg`. The `[gpu]` version is recommended.
How do I use the rembg node once it's installed?
You can find the *'Image Remove Background (rembg)'* node in ComfyUI and use it as necessary.
Who should I credit for the helper functions and examples in rembg-comfyui-node?
The acknowledgements section of the documentation thanks WASasquatch's Node Suite for providing great examples and a couple helper functions.
